text:
Discourse has been straightforward to self-host (speaking as the admin of the Malleable instance). Happy to answer any questions if that's something you're interested in for this community. :slightly_smiling_face:

It's true they do seem to be adding AI features lately for some reason, but they are all off by default. In general, Discourse is heavily customisable through settings, plugins, etc.

elements.text: Discourse has been straightforward to self-host (speaking as the admin of the Malleable instance). Happy to answer any questions if that's something you're interested in for this community.

text: I suppose something to ponder here is what sort of "medium" you want to have... Chat (Slack, Matrix, Discord, etc.) in general is more suited to shorter messages. Forums (Discourse, etc.) allow more space for longer topics that get replies over stretches of time. But then there are hybrids like Zulip that are kind of "topic-focused chat". This community's usage of Slack threads is also forum-esque as well. Anyway, worth considering this before making a move.
